name: ShortcutKeys
0:
”Alexa, open shortcut keys”
”What is the shortcut key for copy”
”Paste”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shortcut keys
des:
No more worrying about memorizing all of the shortcut keys while you are trying to get work done! Shortcut Keys is designed to provide an easy way to recall common Windows shortcuts.

Simply ask, "Alexa, what is the shortcut key for copy?" (or paste or undo, etc.) and Alexa will respond with the shortcut that you can use.

Currently, the following shortcuts are supported:
-Copy
-Paste
-Cut
-Save
-Find
-Underline
-Bold
-Italics
-Redo
-Undo
-Lock Screen
-Print
-Select All
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
